page.title: 17ACCUPUNCTURE AT KEMERTON
page.content: At the bottom of{Kemerton Village}is an{Accupuncturist named Merial Darby. She uses the old Chinese method with needles and moxas.There is a type of plastic hammer that has little points on it.She massages with a pencil or the top of a pen.The new way of using accupuncture is with electricity.The sign for moxas is a triangle.The five elements are Fire,Earth,Metal,Water and Wood.The Fire is the most powerful of all the elements.When you are treated,you feel warm inside. At the top of{Kemerton}is a lady named {Tilly Holt}who does special{Silk {Pictures.}She started sewing when she was twelve but didn't start silk pictures until 1968.She does her pictures for money and pleasure.She gets the silks from London.The pictures are from 4cm * 6cm to 55cm * 60cm and cost from Â£250 to Â£5000.
